TopicTitle: KSP 2 freezes when loading specific vehicle from the VAB to the launch pad

Articles.Content:
For one of my vehicles, every time I load from the VAB to the launch pad the application freezes on the splash screen.  Re-loading the game, and vehicle reliably reproduces the issue.

Build ID 10624168.
Well that was odd - after five minutes it eventually loaded with the rocket floating above KSC in a horizontal orientation and with no staging.
